Detailed_Explanation: VALOR ALTO CRÍTICO - Sensor/parameter reading abnormally high. Immediate action required. Example: Coolant temp >110°C, Oil pressure sensor shorted high.
VALOR BAJO CRÍTICO - Sensor/parameter reading abnormally low. Immediate action required. Example: Oil pressure <100kPa, Battery voltage <10V.
SEÑAL ERRÁTICA - Signal unstable, intermittent, or incorrect values. Example: Sensor wiring loose, intermittent short, fluctuating readings.
VOLTAJE ALTO - Circuit voltage higher than expected. Example: Sensor power >5.5V (expect 5V), shorted to battery voltage.
VOLTAJE BAJO - Circuit voltage lower than expected. Example: Sensor power <4.5V (expect 5V), high resistance in wiring.
CORRIENTE BAJA - Circuit current lower than expected. Example: Injector/solenoid not drawing enough current, open circuit.
CORRIENTE ALTA - Circuit current higher than expected. Example: Injector/solenoid drawing too much current, short circuit.
NO RESPONDE CORRECTAMENTE - Component not responding to commands. Example: VGT actuator stuck, EGR valve not moving to commanded position.
FRECUENCIA ANORMAL - Signal frequency, pulse width, or period incorrect. Example: Wheel speed sensor wrong frequency, camshaft sensor timing off.
TASA ACTUALIZACIÓN ANORMAL - Data not updating at expected rate. Example: CAN message too slow/fast, sensor update rate wrong.
TASA CAMBIO ANORMAL - Parameter changing too quickly or slowly. Example: Coolant temp rising too fast, fuel rate change too abrupt.
OTRO MODO FALLA - Failure mode not covered by other FMIs. Check specific DTC documentation for details.
FALLA COMPONENTE - Complete component failure detected. Example: Sensor dead, ECU module failed, total system failure.
FUERA CALIBRACIÓN - Component out of calibration range. Example: Sensor drift, injector timing off, pressure sensor offset.
INSTRUCCIÓN ESPECIAL - Refer to OEM documentation for specific instructions. May require dealer tool or special procedure.
VALOR ALTO MODERADO - Parameter high but not critical. Monitor and schedule maintenance. Example: DEF temp slightly elevated.
VALOR ALTO MEDIO - Parameter moderately high. Attention needed soon. Example: Transmission temp 105°C (warning level).
VALOR BAJO MODERADO - Parameter low but not critical. Monitor and schedule maintenance. Example: Battery voltage 11.5V (marginal).
VALOR BAJO MEDIO - Parameter moderately low. Attention needed soon. Example: Coolant level 30% (needs refill).
ERROR DATOS - Data received is invalid or corrupted. Example: CAN message checksum error, invalid parameter value.
DATOS DRIFT ALTO - Parameter drifting higher over time. Example: Sensor reading creeping up, calibration degrading.
DATOS DRIFT BAJO - Parameter drifting lower over time. Example: Sensor reading creeping down, calibration degrading.
